author: ekoneil

BB: self
Test: site build pass

author: sebb
msg: Fix Class Cast Exception when fetching elements

author: dreid
msg: - add a detailed mailing list block to the asfext definition
- change PMC to pmc to be more inline with the doap capitalisation
- try and adopt asfext within the xsl (doesn't work at present)
- add a sample mailing list block to the httpd doap file
This adds in the detailed mailing list info block, which will be optional
but available if projects want to use it. Presently my xslt knowledge isn't
great enough to figure out why the xsl won't pickup anything with an asfext:
prefix, which is mildly annoying :-(
The changes that Joshua made to the html output are really nice though and
make the output much more legible. Nice work!
I know some people still don't like the asfext namespace, but until we have
a different tag that we can all agree on, it'll suffice.
